name: learning_outcome_link_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an outcome context link is changed by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when an outcome link is changed inside of a context.

schema.context_id: The Canvas ID of the context the learning outcome is used in.
schema.context_type: The type of context the learning outcome is used in, usually Course.
schema.learning_outcome_group_id: The local Canvas id of the related learning outcome group.
schema.learning_outcome_id: The local Canvas id of the related learning outcome.
schema.learning_outcome_link_id: The local Canvas id of the learning outcome link that was updated.
schema.updated_at: The time that the learning outcome link was last modified.
schema.workflow_state: The workflow status of the learning outcome link (e.g. active, deleted)
